entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: The merpeople are described as making screechy noises when they were above water.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is able to speak Mermish, indicating his ability to communicate with the merpeople.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey rescues Ron from Percy's clutches and tends to Fleur's injuries.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is rescued by Madam Pomfrey from Percy's clutches.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy has Ron in his clutches.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is injured and refuses to let Madam Pomfrey clean her wounds.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Gabrielle is Fleur's sister and is being taken care of by someone.
